home description: is an onchain social graph protocol for Ethereum accounts that complements ENS.
integrate description: If you integrate EFP into your app, message us and we'll add you to this list, promote you on Twitter, and send you a special EFP Integration POAP!
integrate efp description: is an onchain social graph protocol for Ethereum accounts, a primitive of the Ethereum identity stack that complements ENS and Sign in with Ethereum.
connect to see more: Connect your wallet to start swiping!
no more profiles: Looks like you have swiped through all the profiles! Come back later for more.
top eight limit: Your Top 8 is filled up! To add someone new, you must remove someone first. ðŸ˜ˆ
top eight description: Add friends to your Top 8! You can always add or remove people later.
profile.notConfirmedByUserDescription: This list is not confirmed to be owned by the displayed user. A user must set a list as their Primary List to confirm it as their list.
following myprofile empty second: To get started, just browse and start following. Once you confirm them onchain, they'll show up here.
followers empty: This user doesn't have any followers
reset slot message: Are you sure you want to reset the List? This will clear your list and set all the roles back to your wallet address. This action cannot be undone.
swipe description second: Swipe right to Follow, swipe left to NOPE.
cart.title: Cart
cart.noItems: Your cart is empty. Follow people then come back here to confirm it onchain.
not manager: You are not the Manager of the list.
recommended.title: Recommended
mint description: An NFT representing your List will appear in your wallet
cart.clearCart.description: Are you sure you want to clear all items from your cart?
transaction.selectChainDescription: Select the chain you want to perform the action on.
transaction.selectChainLater: You can always change this later
set new primary: Set new list as Primary List
summary.title: Summary
leaderboard description: A never ending crypto popularity contest - onchain!
team description: Committed to bringing identity onchain with the Ethereum identity stack, we're building Ethereum Follow Protocol and Ethereum Identity Kit.
foundation description: The Follow Protocol Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to advancing the Ethereum ecosystem.
integrations description: EFP is an onchain social graph protocol for Ethereum accounts, a primitive of the Ethereum identity stack designed to complement ENS and Sign-in with Ethereum.
example profile description: Use ENS for the user's name, avatar, header, bio, and more. EFP completes the profile and shows how a user relates to the rest of the crypto community.
example profile card link: Profile Cards on Ethereum Identity Kit
example profile count link: API: EFP follower and following counts
example activity title: Open social graph for an activity feed
example activity description: Start showing your users the activity of their friends right away by pulling who they follow onchain.
example connect onchain description: Embed the EFP Follow button to enable users to follow onchain new friends they discover in your app.
example connect onchain button link: Follow button on Ethereum Identity Kit
feed description: The latest onchain activity of who you follow on EFP ðŸ‘€
notifications.title: Notifications
transaction.claimPOAPDescription: Congratulations! You've earned a POAP for being an early user of EFP.
modal.cancelTransactions.title: Cancel All Transactions
modal.cancelTransactions.description: Are you sure you want to cancel all pending transactions?
